abilities: Buff Duration +38% / Damage to Abnormal Status +8%

attackStats.name: Weapon Mastery
attackStats.detail: <bg val={Base +20%}> <bg src={/class-icons/other/lynn/forest-power-iv.png} tip={Forest Power IV (4th Job)} val={+70%}>

attackStats.name: DEX
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training (1st Job)} val={+30}> <bg src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/berserk.png} tip={Berserk (2nd Job)} val={+20}> <bg src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/outdoor-training.png} tip={Outdoor Training (2nd Job)} val={+30}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/power-of-destiny.png} tip={Power of Destiny (5th Job)} src={/class-icons/5th-job/power-of-destiny-boon.png} tip={Power of Destiny - Boon (5th Job)} val={+30, based on skill chosen}> <bg type={def} sub={opt} src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior (4th Job)} val={+15% to assigned AP} subSrc={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} subTip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} subVal={extra +400%}>

attackStats.name: Attack
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/heros-echo.png} tip={Hero's Echo (Beginner Skill)} val={+4%}> <bg src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/awakening.png} tip={Awakening (1st Job)} val={+50}> <bg src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/physical-training.png} tip={Physical Training (1st Job)} val={+30}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/power-of-destiny.png} tip={Power of Destiny (5th Job)} src={/class-icons/5th-job/power-of-destiny-boon.png} tip={Power of Destiny - Boon (5th Job)} val={+30, based on skill chosen}>

attackStats.name: Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/other/lynn/commune.png} tip={Commune (4th Job)} val={+30%}> <bg type={debuff} src={/class-icons/other/lynn/predators-blow.png} tip={Predator's Blow (4th Job)} val={+10%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/other/lynn/aura-of-destiny.png} tip={Aura of Destiny (Hyper Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+20%}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/power-of-destiny.png} tip={Power of Destiny (5th Job)} src={/class-icons/5th-job/power-of-destiny-might.png} tip={Power of Destiny - Might (5th Job)} val={+20%, based on skill chosen}>

attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/link-skills/courage.png} tip={Courage (Link Skill)} val={+4% & +2% per stack} val={(Max. +12% from stacks)}>

buffInfo.summons: <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/peck-1.png} tip={Peck (2nd Job)} dur={(Toggle)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/earth-pulverization.png} tip={Earth Pulverization (3rd Job)} dur={[30s](30s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/beasts-rage.png} tip={Beast's Rage (5th Job)} dur={[8s](120s cd)}>
buffInfo.buffCd: <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/aura-of-destiny.png} tip={Aura of Destiny (Hyper Skill)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/maple-world-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Maple World Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} dur={[60s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/overdrive.png} tip={Overdrive (5th Job)} dur={[28s](60s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/loaded-dice.png} tip={Loaded Dice (5th Job)}>(10s cd)(180s cd <tt src={/class-icons/common/roll-of-the-dice.png} tip={Roll of the Dice (5th Job)}>) <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/heros-echo.png} tip={Hero's Echo (Beginner Skill)} dur={[2400s](300s cd)}> [<tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/power-of-destiny.png} tip={Power of Destiny (5th Job)}> <bold text={Power of Destiny}>: <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/power-of-destiny-might.png} tip={Power of Destiny: Might (5th Job)} dur={[45s](90s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/power-of-destiny-perceive.png} tip={Power of Destiny: Perceive (5th Job)} dur={[60s](180s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/power-of-destiny-boon.png} tip={Power of Destiny: Boon (5th Job)} dur={[60s](90s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/power-of-destiny-journey.png} tip={Power of Destiny: Journey (5th Job)} dur={[300s](600s cd)}> <em text={(One effect can be chosen at a time, resets at 12:00 AM UTC)}>]
buffInfo.damageReduce: <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/ethereal-form.png} tip={Ethereal Form (5th Job)} dur={[3s](-MP | 60s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/focus-forest-protection.png} tip={[Focus] Forest Protection (Hyper Skill)} dur={[40s](-30% & blocks 1 death | 300s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/natures-grace.png} tip={Nature's Grace (5th Job)} dur={[30s](Up to 100% HP Barrier | 180s cd)}>

linkSkill.name: Courage
linkSkill.shortDesc: When attacking a boss monster, damage by 4%, if the attack target is a boss monster, damage increases by 2% for each stack every 2 seconds, stackable up to 6 times, duration 5 seconds

build: <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/light-steps.png} tip={Light Steps}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/forest-power-i.png} tip={Forest Power I}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/spirit-guide-unity-pan.png} tip={Spirit Guide Unity: Pan}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/focus-heal.png} tip={[Focus] Heal}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/strike-1.png} tip={Strike}>

<tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/light-leap.png} tip={Light Leap}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/spirit-guide-unity-penni.png} tip={Spirit Guide Unity: Penni}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/forest-power-ii.png} tip={Forest Power II}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/forest-wind.png} tip={Forest Wind}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/strike-2.png} tip={Strike}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/peck-1.png} tip={Peck}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/sweep.png} tip={Sweep}>

<tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/vitality-affinity.png} tip={Vitality Affinity}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/spirit-guide-unity-paeon.png} tip={Spirit Guide Unity: Paeon}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/forest-power-iii.png} tip={Forest Power III}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/natures-providence.png} tip={Nature's Providence}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/strike-3.png} tip={Strike}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/earth-pulverization.png} tip={Earth Pulverization}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/peck-2.png} tip={Peck}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/sneak-attack.png} tip={Sneak Attack}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/focus-support-flight.png} tip={[Focus] Support Flight}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/purify.png} tip={Purify}>

<tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/commune.png} tip={Commune}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/guardians-signet.png} tip={Guardian's Signet}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/forest-power-iv.png} tip={Forest Power IV}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/focus-heal-boost.png} tip={[Focus] Heal Boost}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/natures-providence-boost.png} tip={Nature's Providence Boost}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/maple-warrior.png} tip={Maple Warrior}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/strike-4.png} tip={Strike}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/roar.png} tip={Roar}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/peck-3.png} tip={Peck}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/predators-blow.png} tip={Predator's Blow}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/whirlwind.png} tip={Whirlwind}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/mother-natures-touch.png} tip={Mother Nature's Touch}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/support-flight.png} tip={Support Flight}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/common/heros-will.png} tip={Hero's Will}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/heaven-earth-reinforce-140.png} tip={Heaven Earth - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/heaven-earth-boss-rush-180.png} tip={Heaven Earth - Boss Rush}> Heaven Earth - Reinforce and Boss Rush_<tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/coercion-reinforce-140.png} tip={Coercion - Reinforce}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/coercion-magic-enhancement-180.png} tip={Coercion - Magic Enhancement}> Coercion - Reinforce and Magic Enhancement_<tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/barrier-shield-reinforce-165.png} tip={Barrier - Shield Reinforce}> Barrier - Shield Reinforce_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/earth-stomp.png} tip={Earth Stomp (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/black-tornado-kick-160.png} tip={Black Tornado Kick (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/transformation.png} tip={Transformation (3rd Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/heaven-punch.png} tip={Heaven Earth Punch (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/chain-attack.png} tip={Chain Attack (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/heaven-thunderbolt-strike.png} tip={Heaven: Thunderbolt Strike (3rd Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/heaven-upper-punch.png} tip={Heaven: Upper Punch (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/earth-wind-spin-kick.png} tip={Wind Spin Kick (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/earth-smash-kick.png} tip={Earth Smash Kick (2nd Job)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
6 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/heaven-punch.png} tip={Heaven Earth Punch (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/heaven-upper-punch.png} tip={Heaven: Upper Punch (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/earth-stomp.png} tip={Earth Stomp (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/earth-smash-kick.png} tip={Earth Smash Kick (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/heaven-thunderbolt-strike.png} tip={Heaven: Thunderbolt Strike (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/earth-wind-spin-kick.png} tip={Wind Spin Kick (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/transformation.png} tip={Transformation (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/chain-attack.png} tip={Chain Attack (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/shadowless-kick.png} tip={Shadowless Kick (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/mo-xuan/black-tornado-kick-160.png} tip={Black Tornado Kick (Hyper Skill)}>

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to Drakkinnite, Lantic, Gon, and the members of the Mo Xuan Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Hyper Passive Build + Boost Nodes Build + Inner Ability

extraContent.title: Focus Skills & Spirit Guide Skills
extraContent.content:
While Lynn is in a party, they can select a party member as a 'Focal Target' which skills labelled as [Focus] will affect. If Lynn is not in a party or is in a party by themselves, they will be the Focal Target. Using the Beginner Skill [Focus], Lynn can choose who the Focal Target is

Below is a list of all Focus Skills:

  • [Focus] Heal - 1st Job
  • [Focus] Support Flight - 3rd Job
  • [Focus] Forest Protection - Hyper Skill
  • [Focus] Awaken - 5th Job

Focal Target cannot be yourself for [Focus] Support Flight & Awaken

Lynn's attacks can be categorized by their Spirit Guides, Pan, Penni, and Paeon. Each Spirit Guide provides a stacking %Final Damage (additively) buff whenever their attacks successfully hit an enemy

Below is a list of all Pan attacks:

  • Strike - 1st Job
  • Earth Pulverization - 3rd Job
  • Roar - 4th Job

Below is a list of all Penni attacks:

  • Peck - 2nd Job
  • Sweep - 2nd Job
  • Whirlwind - 4th Job

Below is a list of all Paeon attacks:

  • Sneak Attack - 3rd Job
  • Predator's Blow - 4th Job
  • Raid - Hyper Skill
  • Beast's Rage - 5th Job

primary.name: Return to Xuan Mountain
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, Move back to the Forest Spring.\nCooldown: 600 sec.
details: To obtain this skill, complete the Mo Xuan storyline

primary.name: Xuan Mountain Momentum
primary.shortDesc: Increases final damage by 10% and critical damage by 10%
details: This skill is gained and leveled up by completing the Mo Xuan storyline

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the Mo Xuan storyline
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Heaven Punch
primary.shortDesc: Activates the current mountain's initial state when used\nHyunsan: When acquiring the first form [Heaven], you can attack up to 1 time\nHyunsan: When acquiring the 2nd form [Heaven], you can attack up to 2 times.

primary.name: First Form Heaven
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 10 MP\nType 1 [Heaven]: Attacks up to 4 enemies 6 times with 60% damage.

primary.name: Heaven Upper Punch
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attacks up to 8 enemies 6 times with 260% damage.\n[Herbivorous Link] Final damage increased by 50%\nCooldown: 5 seconds

primary.name: Double Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5. Allows you to jump a greater distance
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice

primary.name: Up Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5. Allows you to leap a greater distance.

primary.name: Awakening
primary.shortDesc: Critical rate 30%, attack power increased by 50\nRecovers 3% of maximum HP/MP every 3 seconds, recovery possible even during battle

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Increases DEX by 30 and Attack Power by 20

primary.name: Earth Stomp
primary.shortDesc: Activates the current mountain's initial state when used\nHyunsan: When acquiring the first form [Earth], you can attack up to 1 time\nHyunsan: When acquiring the 2nd form [Earth], you can attack up to 2 times.

primary.name: Wu Shen: First Form Earth
primary.shortDesc: Consumes 22 MP\nType 1 [Earth]: Attacks up to 8 enemies 6 times with 110% damage.

primary.name: Earth Smash Kick
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20, Attacks up to 8 enemies 9 times with 300% damage.\n[Herbivorous Link] Final damage increased by 50%\nCooldown: 8 seconds

primary.name: Berserk
primary.shortDesc: Attack speed level 2, DEX +20

primary.name: Light Air Training
primary.shortDesc: Movement speed increased by 50, jump power increased by 20, and maximum movement speed increased by 20.

primary.name: Outdoor Training
primary.shortDesc: Increases DEX by 30, Defense by 300, and Max HP by 20%\nReduces damage taken by 10%, increases stance rate by 40%

primary.name: Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 220%, Number of Attacks: 5
details: This version replaces the 2nd Job version
Increases %Damage of attack

primary.name: Earth Pulverization
primary.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 300, Max enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 320%, Number of Attacks: 12
After attacking, a burning fissure is created at the attack location for 30 sec. Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 10%, Number of Attacks: 5, Duration: every 1 sec
Cooldown: 30 sec
Burning Fissure - Normal Monster Damage: +1250%
primary.desc: Pan smashes the ground creating a lingering Burning Fissure that damages enemies within it
details: Burning Fissure deals increased damage to regular monsters
Burning Fissure is unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Peck
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 350, Automatically overwritten when a better version is learned via Job Advancement. Damage: 360%, Number of Attacks: 5\nCan be toggled On/Off
details: This version replaces the 2nd Job version
Increases %Damage and Number of Attacks

primary.name: [Focus] Support Flight
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 50, Cooldown: 20 sec\nInstantly moves you to the current Focal Target's location or vice versa.\nCannot use if the Focal Target is too far away
details: [Skill Key]: Teleport to Focal Target
[Down Arrow Key + Skill Key]: Teleport the Focal Target to your location
Focal Target cannot be yourself
Cannot be used if Focal Target is too far away

primary.name: Sneak Attack
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 140. Upon skill use, Paeon prepares to attack. Then, if another Spirit Guide skill damages an enemy, Paeon will attack the same enemy.\nMax Enemies Hit: 4, Damage: 680%, Number of Follow-up Attacks: 8\nCooldown: 2 sec
primary.desc: While toggled, upon successful Pan or Penni attacks, Paeon deals an additional attack to the same target
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Purify
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60. Purifies nearby allies for 20 sec.\nPurified allies lose 1 harmful effect every 2 sec, up to 5 total effects.\nCooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Cast a buff that periodically cures affected party members of Abnormal Statuses (up to 5 statuses)

primary.name: Nature's Providence
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Duration: 90 sec. All party members - Ignore Defense: +30%

primary.name: Forest Power III
primary.shortDesc: Magic Mastery: +60%, INT: +20, Magic Attack: +10
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Grants flat INT and Magic Attack

primary.name: Spirit Guide Unity: Paeon
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +50%, Critical Damage: +30%, Boss Damage: +35%, Attack Speed: +1\nUpon using a Paeon skill on an enemy - Final Damage: +5%, Max Stacks: 3, Duration: 30 sec
primary.desc: Successful attacks using Paeon skills grants a stacking %Final Damage buff (max 3 stacks, additively)
details: Additionally, increases %Crit Rate, %Crit Damage, %Boss Damage, and Attack Speed (by 1 stage)

primary.name: Vitality Affinity
primary.shortDesc: Status Resistance: +16, Elemental Resistance: +16%, Defense: +320, Knockback Resistance: +50%

primary.name: Strike
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Max Enemies Hit: 7, Damage: 315%, Number of Attacks: 6
details: This version replaces the 3rd Job version
Increases Max Enemies Hit, %Damage, and Number of Attacks

primary.name: Roar
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Max Enemies Hit: 12, Damage: 520%, Number of Attacks: 10, Cooldown: 30 sec

primary.name: Peck
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 450, Penni automatically attacks enemies - Damage: 660%, Number of attacks: 6
details: This version replaces the 3rd Job version
Increases %Damage and Number of Attacks

primary.name: Whirlwind
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60. You move back, and deal 580% damage to up to 12 enemies in front of you 4 times. Holding the skill allows you to float for up to 3 sec\nCooldown: 15 sec
primary.desc: Teleport backwards and releases a gust of wind forward damaging enemies
details: Holding down the Skill Key will cause you to float briefly

primary.name: Support Flight
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300. Teleports all party members on the current map to your location\nCooldown: 30 sec

primary.name: Predator's Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1050%, Number of Attacks: 7.\nEnemies hit take 10% additional damage for 40 sec\nCooldown: 40 sec
primary.desc: Paeon pounces at nearby targets dealing damage and applying a debuff
details: [Debuff]: Enemy takes increased %Damage
Can only be used when enemies are nearby
Prioritizes enemies with the highest Max HP

primary.name: Mother Nature's Touch
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200. Affects all party members on the same map - Removes all harmful effects, immediately restores 100% of Max HP, heals 10% HP every second for 30 sec\nCooldown: 60 sec
primary.desc: Upon casting, cures all party members of Abnormal Statuses and restores %Max HP
details: After casting, grants party members a buff that periodically restores %Max HP

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 70, Goddess of Maple World appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs

primary.name: Forest Power IV
primary.shortDesc: Magic Mastery: +70%, INT: +30, Magic ATT: +30
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Grants flat INT and Magic Attack

primary.name: [Focus] Heal Boost
primary.shortDesc: Focal Target - Increased healing: +10%, Attack Power: +10, Magic ATT: +10
details: Increases amount healed
Now grants affected Focal Target flat Attack and Magic Attack

primary.name: Nature's Providence Boost
primary.shortDesc: Nature's Providence - Item Drop Rate +10%
details: Now additionally increases %Item Drop Rate

primary.name: Guardian's Signet
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +50%

primary.name: Commune
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Magic ATT by 50, Buff duration by 50%, Knockback Resistance by 50%, and Damage by 30%

hyperActive.name: [Focus] Forest Protection
hyperActive.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 600. Creates a protective zone at the location of the current Focal Target for 40 sec, grants a Damage Reduction and Fatal Damage Negation buff to all party members within the protective zone
Damage Reduction: Reduces damage taken by 30% (including percentage HP attacks)
Fatal Damage Negation: Protects from one KO
Party members that receive Fatal Damage Negation cannot receive it again for 300 sec.
Cooldown: 300 sec
hyperActive.desc: Create a protective barrier at the location of the Focal Target where party members inside it gain a buff
details: [Buff]: Reduces damage taken including %Max HP attacks and protects allies from one KO<bp_After the Fatal Damage Negation buff, you may not receive another one for a short amount of time_>

hyperActive.name: Raid
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 200, Max enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1780%, Number of Attacks: 12\nCooldown: 30 sec
hyperActive.desc: Paeon dashes forward leaving behind a trail of slashes

hyperActive.name: Aura of Destiny
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nCooldown: 120 sec. Only applies to Lynn characters in the party.

fifthMain.name: Beast's Rage
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1000. Summons Paeon in front of you. Paeon Activations: 10, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 960%, Number of Attacks: 12, Duration: 8 sec, Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: Summon Paeon creating a large damaging field of slashing attacks
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Beak Strike
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 400, Duration: 40 sec, Enhances Peck. Max enemies Hit: 12, Enhanced Damage: 720%, Number of Attacks: 6, Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: While active, enhances <tt src={/class-icons/other/lynn/peck-1.png} tip={Peck (2nd Job)}> resulting in a stronger attack that damages nearby enemies
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: [Focus] Awaken
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1150, Duration: 30 sec, Final Damage: +30% for self
Grants a +10% Final Damage buff to the current Focal Target (cannot be yourself), which scales based on your INT stat
Upon skill use, all party members gain Exhaust 30 sec
Focal Target: Final Damage increases by 1% per 1000 INT, up to 110%
Exhaust: Prevents the use of Awaken if you or the Focal Target have the exhaust effect
Cooldown: 120 sec
fifthMain.desc: When used, increases %Final Damage for self, grants a buff to Focal Target, and 'Exhaust' to all party members
details: [Focal Target Buff]: Increases %Final Damage<bp_Focal Target buff scales off of your INT stat: +1% for every 1000 INT (up to 110%, additively)_Focal Target cannot be yourself_>
[Exhaust]: Cannot receive the effects of Awaken again for a set time
Does not stack with Bishop's <tt src={/class-icons/explorers/bishop/benediction.png} tip={Benediction (5th Job, Bishop)}> Benediction<bp_Awaken's effects are always prioritized_>

fifthMain.name: Nature's Grace
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 500. Immediately restores 100% of Max HP to all party members, grants you the [Excess Healing] effect for 30 sec
[Excess Healing]: Your healing can now restore up to 200% of Max HP instead of the usual 100%, helaing that exceeds the usual 100% amount becomes a shield
The shield disappears when the [Excess Healing] effect ends
Cooldown: 185 sec
fifthMain.desc: When used, restores %Max HP and grants all party members the buff 'Excess Healing'
details: [Excess Healing]: Healing from caster that exceeds Max HP becomes a shield

fifthBoost.name: Strike Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Max Targets: +1
[Lv. 40]: Ignore DEF: +20%

fifthBoost.name: Peck Boost
details: [Lv. 20]: Damage Against Normal Enemies: +10%

details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Sneak Attack
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 170, Spirit Guide [Paeon] prepares a powerful sneak attack. If another Spirit Guide skill deals damage to the enemy, Spirit Guide [Paeon] uses his sneak attack on that enemy to deal 1280% damage to up to 6 enemies nearby, an additional 8 times.\nHEXA Sneak Attack Cooldown: 2 sec.
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Source Flow
originSkill.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1500, Invincible during casting\nMax Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1080%, Number of Attacks: 12, Spirit Guide Activations: 54\nCooldown: 360 sec

boostCore.name: [Focus] Awaken Boost
boostCore.shortDesc: Using [Focus] Awaken increases your Final Damage by an additional 40%, increases the current Focal Target's (cannot be you) Final Damage by an additional 20%\nPassive Effect - All Stats: +90

boostCore.name: Nature's Grace Boost
boostCore.shortDesc: Immediate Healing increased to 110%, [Excess Healing] increased to 210% of Max HP, Duration increased to 40 sec\nPassive Effect - All Stats: +90

meta: Lynn is an INT mage class part of its own class group, Forest Child. Lynn utilize Memorial Staff as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Lynn can equip Leaves and Shields
